body_html:
I was able to solve this in a (somewhat hacky) way by following the instructions here:

http://stackoverflow.com/a/38586576/6598481

In short, add the following within toolchain{} in the file tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.

cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include"

This is discussed in #1157.

This is discussed in #1157.
body:
I was able to solve this in a (somewhat hacky) way by following the instructions here:

http://stackoverflow.com/a/38586576/6598481

In short, add the following within toolchain{} in the file tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.

`cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/local/cuda-7.5/include"`

This is discussed in #1157.
